title: Drawing, "Poster Design for British General Post Office: "Post Office"", November 5, 1936
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper
signed: Signed in white gouache, lower right: McK.K.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: A silhouette in profile facing left of the mythological god Mercury in his winged hat. A white frame surrounds the head, setting it off from a blue background. On two blue ribbon-shaped rectangles superimposed over head: POST / OFFICE.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Poster Design for British General Post Office: "Post Office"", November 5, 1936.
November 5, 1936. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-523.
